hardcoded_hotspots.excerpt: heading: "The geometry of rhythm" ... fallback paragraphs in disciplineFit
hardcoded_hotspots.why_hotspot: High-visibility marketing copy on the shotguns landing page; should be editable by content team.
Long advisory copy appears on a core marketing page and is currently hardcoded.
Heritage narrative copy is prominent and should be CMS-managed.
Service guidance copy is hardcoded but should be editable with service updates.

hardcoded_hotspots.excerpt: primaryLinks and secondaryLinks arrays define main nav labels/URLs
hardcoded_hotspots.why_hotspot: Global navigation and footer copy are hardcoded; CMS control would reduce code deploys for changes.
Concierge hero copy is marketing-level content and likely to evolve.
Build-journey intro is a narrative block that should be editable alongside CMS steps.
Stage pages are likely to become real editorial content; CMS would allow expansion without code edits.

notes: Most routes blend Sanity with local fixtures and hardcoded copy.
No MD/MDX content files were detected under src for routing surfaces.
External API content appears inside hybrid routes (concierge, fschat, build journey, admin dashboards).
